thread.section_title: FlightNetwork.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of FlightNetwork.com | www.flightnetwork.com
thread.title: Salman Alotaibi

author: Salman Alotaibi
title: Salman Alotaibi
text:
My flight was canceled from Atlanta to NewYork city. The costomer service called me to help me rearrange my travel plans. Unfourtunately, they couldn't find a convenient flight the first time and they advised me to cancel and give me a full refund. However, I only have this break the whole year, so I booked a oneway flight in another airline and then called the costomer service to get a refund on the flight that is from atlanta to newyork and keep the return flight from newyork to atlanta.
Both costumer service representatives were cooperativeand gave me convenient solutions and I thank them very much.
